TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ButtonField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中以按钮形式显示的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as a button in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由数据绑定控件 (如和) 若要显示的按钮将显示每个记录。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display a button for each record that is displayed. 具体取决于使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示对象。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控件显示对象作为某一列，而控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 单击按钮字段中的按钮会导致父数据绑定控件的命令事件。Clicking a button in a button field raises the command event of the parent data-bound control. 你可以提供一个自定义的例程命令按钮单击事件处理程序提供命令事件时执行。You can provide a custom routine to perform when a command button is clicked by providing an event handler for the command event. > [!NOTE] > 控件将引发事件，而控件引发事件。The control raises the event, while the control raises the event. 若要确定引发命令事件的记录的索引，请使用数据绑定控件传递到命令事件的事件参数的属性。To determine the index of the record that raises the command event, use the property of the event argument that is passed to the command event for the data-bound control. 类会自动填充具有适当的索引值的属性。The class automatically populates the property with the appropriate index value. 若要指定要显示的按钮类型，请使用属性。To specify the type of button to display, use the property. 在显示的链接或命令按钮，使用属性来指定要在按钮中显示的标题。When displaying a link or command button, use the property to specify the caption to display in the buttons. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置属性中中的所有按钮共享相同的标题。If you set the property, all buttons in a share the same caption. 或者，您可以将绑定对象与数据源中的字段。Alternatively, you can bind the object to a field in a data source. 这使您可以显示不同的标题中的按钮对象。This allows you to display different captions for the buttons in the object. 指定字段中的值用于按钮的文本标题。The values that are in the specified field are used for the text captions of the buttons. 设置属性将绑定对象与数据源中的字段。Set the property to bind a object to a field in a data source. 在显示一个图像按钮，使用属性来指定要显示在按钮的图像对象。When displaying an image button, use the property to specify the image to display for the buttons in the object. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有按钮对象共享相同的映像。All buttons in a object share the same image. 您可以隐藏通过设置数据绑定控件中的对象属性设置为`false`。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 对象可用于自定义其标头和表尾部分。The object allows you to customize its header and footer sections. 若要在页眉或页脚部分显示标题，请设置或属性，分别。To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the or properties, respectively. 而不是显示文本的页眉节中，您可以通过设置中显示图像属性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 若要隐藏中的标头部分对象，设置属性设置为`false`。To hide the header section in a object, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 一些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 可以显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支持这些数据绑定控件针对个别按钮字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual button field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标头部分 （如果可用），请使用`ShowHeader`的控件属性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the `ShowHeader` property for the control. 你还可以自定义外观通过设置该字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （字体颜色、 背景色等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|样式设置The style settings for| |--------------------|----------------------------| ||子 Web 服务器控件的。The child Web server controls of the .| ||脚注部分的。The footer section of the .| ||标头部分。The header section of the .| ||数据中的项。The data items in the .| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要显示的列中的命令按钮对象控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display a column of command buttons in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来初始化的新实例类。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 将字段添加到动态创建的数据绑定控件时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要添加动态对象传递给数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To add a object dynamically to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the data-bound control. 例如，如果使用的控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管您可以添加字段动态到数据绑定控件时，应声明为静态，字段，以及然后能显示或隐藏，根据情况。Although you can add fields dynamically to a data-bound control, fields should be declared statically, and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明的所有应用字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.#ctor 构造函数添加动态地为对象控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.#ctor constructor to add a object dynamically to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldCtor/CS/buttonfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldCtor/VB/buttonfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串表示当单击 对象中的按钮时要执行的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that represents the action to perform when a button in a object is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 中的按钮时要执行的操作的名称。

span.span: The name of the action to perform when a button in the is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性关联的命令名称，如`"Add"`或`"Remove"`的按钮在对象。Use the property to associate a command name, such as `"Add"` or `"Remove"`, with the buttons in the object. 可以设置属性设置为任何字符串，标识要单击的命令按钮时执行的操作。You can set the property to any string that identifies the action to perform when the command button is clicked. 你可以然后以编程方式确定事件处理程序中的命令名称并执行相应的操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name in an event handler and perform the appropriate actions. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有按钮对象共享相同的命令名称。All buttons in a object share the same command name. 数据绑定控件识别某些命令名称自动引发和处理该控件的相应事件。Data-bound controls recognize certain command names and automatically raise and handle the appropriate events for the control. 识别以下的命令名称：The following command names are recognized: - `"Cancel"` - `"Delete"` - `"Edit"` - `"Insert"` - `"New"` - `"Page"` - `"Select"` - `"Sort"` - `"Update"` 若要调用分页，请设置到`"Page"`并包含控制对`"First"`， `"Last"`， `"Prev"`， `"Next"`，或页码。To invoke paging, set the to `"Page"` and the of the contained control to `"First"`, `"Last"`, `"Prev"`, `"Next"`, or a page number. 但是，由于有关控件始终是整数行索引，控件并不适用于调用分页。However, since the for a control is always the integer row index, a control is not suitable for invoking paging. 同样，尽管您可以调用通过设置排序到`"Sort"`，则属性控件始终是整数的行索引。Similarly, while you can invoke sorting by setting the to `"Sort"`, the property for a control is always the integer row index. 出于此原因，控件并不适用于调用排序。For this reason, a control is not suitable for invoking sorting. 对于自定义命令名称，如`"Add"`和`"Remove"`，您需要自己编写检查的命令名称，并执行一些自定义操作的事件代码。For custom command names, such as `"Add"` and `"Remove"`, you need to write the event code to check the command name and perform some custom action. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 并非所有的命令名称所识别的每个数据绑定控件。Not all command names are recognized by every data-bound controls. 例如，`"New"`不能识别控件并`"Select"`不能识别控件。For example, `"New"` is not recognized by the control and `"Select"` is not recognized by the control. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定中按钮的命令名称对象的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a command name for the buttons in a object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 重写时方法在派生类中，调用基类以确保复制该对象的所有属性的方法。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, call the method of the base class to ensure that all properties of the object are copied.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据字段的名称，该数据字段的值绑定到 控件的 属性，此控件由 对象呈现。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field for which the value is bound to the property of the control that is rendered by the object.

value.span: 要绑定到 的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的属性对象设置为或值，请使用属性指定要绑定到的字段名称对象。When the property of a object is set to the or value, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the object. 字段的值则显示在按钮的文本作为对象。The values of the field are then displayed as the text for the buttons in the object. （可选） 可以设置显示的文本格式设置属性。Optionally, you can format the displayed text by setting the property. 而不是使用属性将绑定对象到某个字段从数据源，您可以使用属性来显示静态文本中的按钮的文本对象。Instead of using the property to bind a object to a field from a data source, you can use the property to display static text for the text of the buttons in the object. 当使用属性时，每个按钮共享相同的标题。When the property is used, each button shares the same caption. > [!NOTE] > 如果并属性均设置，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在中显示的字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which field to display in a column of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/CS/buttonfielddatatextfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/VB/buttonfielddatatextfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataTextFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataTextFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataTextFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataTextFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，该字符串指定字段值的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 指定字段值显示格式的格式字符串。

span.span: A format string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚无特殊格式设置应用于该字段值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定在显示的值的自定义显示格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果属性未设置，而无需任何特殊格式显示字段的值。If the property is not set, the value for the field is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 应用格式字符串，则仅当属性设置。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the value for the field. 例如，在格式字符串`"Item Value: {0}"`，则`{0}`占位符将被替换的字段值中显示时对象。For example, in the format string `"Item Value: {0}"`, the `{0}` placeholder is replaced with the value for the field when it is displayed in the object. 格式字符串的其余部分将显示为文字文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含一个占位符，在最终的显示文本中不包含数据源的字段的值。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the value for the field from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符包含两个部分，用冒号分隔和包装在大括号，窗体中的 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the index for the field value in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 这`A`参数是格式化语法的一部分。This `A` parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元中只有一个字段值，此值只能设置为 0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后面的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要在其中显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数法 （指数） 格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|一般情况下设置显示数值的格式。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 除`X`，格式字符不区分大小写。Except for `X`, the format characters are not case sensitive. `X`格式字符在指定的情况下会显示的十六进制字符。The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数来显示数字。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字符串`"{0:F2}"`显示带两位小数位数的定点数。For example, the format string `"{0:F2}"` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可指定字段的值的自定义显示格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the values of a field. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/CS/buttonfielddatatextfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/VB/buttonfielddatatextfieldvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 当扩展类，可以重写方法来执行自定义格式设置例程。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override the method to perform a custom formatting routine.

summary.span: 获取或设置要为 对象中每个按钮显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display for each button in the object.

value.span: 要为 中每个按钮显示的图像。

span.span: The image to display for each button in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的属性对象设置为值，请使用属性来指定要为每个按钮显示的图像。When the property of a object is set to the value, use the property to specify the image to display for each button. 此映像可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端浏览器支持该格式。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性可指定要为每个按钮中显示的图像对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image to display for each button in the object. 对于要显示此代码示例，必须提供你自己的映像。For this code example to display, you must provide your own image. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldImageUrl/CS/buttonfieldimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldImageUrl/VB/buttonfieldimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化当前的 对象。

span.span: Initializes the current object.

returns.span: ，指示控件无需重新绑定到数据。

span.span: , which indicates the control does not need to rebind to the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用的数据控件与其对象所关联来执行基本的对象初始化的字段，该字段添加到行集合之前的实例。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a rows collection. 数据控件，如并，调用中的方法及其`CreateChildControls`方法之前的其他方法，如`CreateRow`，调用以创建包含数据的特定行。Data controls, such as and , call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods, such as `CreateRow`, are called to create specific rows with data. 调用方法编写的自定义数据绑定控件时，使用对象执行基本初始化对象。Call The method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for a object. 如果实现此方法在的派生的类型需要的任何对象初始化之前它将填充对象的数据，或在控件中方法。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

para.span: 应重写方法并返回，如果该字段需要数据绑定在回发时要正常工作的字段顺序执行。

span.span: You should override the method and return , if the field requires that data binding be performed on postback in order for the field to work correctly.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void InitializeCell (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell cell, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType cellType, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState rowState, int rowIndex);

span.span: The to initialize.

param.name: cellType
param.span: 值，指示行的类型（标头、脚注或数据）。

span.span: A value that indicates the type of row (header, footer, or data).
One of the values.

param.name: rowIndex
param.span: 行的索引（索引从零开始）。

span.span: The zero-based index of the row.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象初始化为指定的行状态。

span.span: Initializes the specified object to the specified row state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将创建由指定的按钮类型属性并将其添加到的集合对象。The method creates the button type that is specified by the property and adds it to the collection of the object. 的属性控件设置为`rowIndex`。The property of the control is set to `rowIndex`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Text { get; set; }
.property instance string Text
Public Overridable Property Text As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中每个按钮显示的静态标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the static caption that is displayed for each button in the object.

value.span: 为 中每个按钮显示的标题。

span.span: The caption displayed for each button in the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的属性对象设置为或值，请使用属性来显示静态文本中的按钮的标题。When the property of a object is set to the or value, use the property to display static text for the caption of the buttons in the . 每个按钮共享相同的标题。Each button shares the same caption. 而不是使用属性用于显示静态文本对象，可以使用要绑定属性到数据源中的字段。Instead of using the property to display static text in a object, you can use the property to bind the to a field in a data source. 然后为按钮的标题显示的字段的值。The values of the field are then displayed as the caption of the buttons. > [!NOTE] > 如果并属性均设置，属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要显示中每个按钮的标题对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption to display for each button in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();
override this.ValidateSupportsCallback : unit -> unit

summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls that are contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是帮助器方法，用于确定控件是否包含在对象支持回调。The method is a helper method that is used to determine whether the controls that are contained in a object support callbacks. 此方法作为空方法 （不包含任何代码的方法） 以指示支持回调实现。This method is implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 方法主要由控件开发人员。The method is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 派生的类类可以重写方法，以指示所包含的字段的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override the method to indicate whether the controls that are contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，实现方法作为空方法，不会引发异常; 否则，使用有用的消息说明为什么不支持回调引发异常。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement the method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
